smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class Analytics only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class FirebaseListAdapterFactory only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class FriendsCellFiller only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (matches[i].firstplayer.id==id) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: matches[i].firstplayer.id==id
Parentheses in (matches[i].secondplayer.id==id) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: matches[i].secondplayer.id==id
Parentheses in (userID == playerID) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: userID == playerID
Optional braces in when expression
Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.google.firebase.database.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.google.firebase.database.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
Private property name is unused.
Private property started is unused.
Function parameter view is unused.
Private property data is unused.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot' is unused.
The import 'com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference' is unused.
The import 'android.util.Log' is unused.
The import 'android.view.View' is unused.
The import 'app.simone.singleplayer.model.SimonColor' is unused.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function increaseSpeed has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class FragmentContainer defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
